author: Shayla Love, Kate Lowenstein, Susan Rinkunas
title: Immune ‘Boosters’ Ignore the Immune System’s Best Quality: Balance
description: What’s more important to the immune system than being "boosted" is balance. An immune system that is overly reactive is not desirable, but in fact, deadly.
content: When I got sick as a kid, my father would draw a cartoon of the battle my immune system was fighting in my body. He would sketch an antibody man, shaped like the letter Y, with bulging muscular arms, getting ready to beat up an angry-faced bacteria or virus. … [+12088 chars]
